title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: O.M.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black, green ink, brush and black ink, green watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: O. M.; upper right corner: 976
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Circular monogram comprised of an "O" drawn in thick black outline with a small black circle in center over which a narrow "M" is superimposed in green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: O.M.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black, green ink, brush and black ink, green watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-94.
